xwikidoc.name: ReviewEmail
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
#set($nl = $xwiki.getNl()) From: $adminemail${nl}To: $email${nl}Subject: Your resource has been reviewed by planete.Sankoré.
Thank you for contributing to planete.Sankoré, and greetings from the planete.Sankoré Review team.
Your contribution, $assettitle, has recently been reviewed and was given a rating of $assetrating.
You can read the full comments from this review by clicking on the following link:
$assetcommentsurl
Remember, you can always modify a resource or collection, then renominate it for a new score.
Scores are based on the Curriki Review System criteria. Use the link below to find criteria for technical completeness, appropriate pedagogy, and accuracy of content:
http://www.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Coll_curriki/CurrikiReviewSystemCollection
Thanks again for contributing! Your contributions help the members of the global planete.Sankoré community access high quality content.
--The planete.Sankoré Team
If you do not wish to receive emails like this in the future, you may change your notifications settings at the following link when you are logged in:
$profileurl
